name: JenkinsDownloadArtifacts
description: Download artifacts produced by a Jenkins job
helpMarkDown: Download artifacts produced by a [Jenkins](https://jenkins.io/) job.
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: Jenkins service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your Jenkins instance.  To create one, click the Manage link and create a new Jenkins Service Endpoint.

inputs.name: jobName
inputs.label: Job name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Jenkins job to download artifacts from.  This must exactly match the job name on the Jenkins server.

inputs.name: saveTo
inputs.label: Save to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Jenkins artifacts will be downloaded and saved to this directory.  This directory will be created if it does not exist.

inputs.name: jenkinsBuild
inputs.label: Download artifacts produced by
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download artifacts produced by the last successful build, or from a specific build instance.

inputs.name: jenkinsBuildNumber
inputs.label: Jenkins build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Download artifacts produced by this build.

inputs.name: itemPattern
inputs.label: Item Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimatch pattern to filter files to be downloaded.

inputs.name: downloadCommitsAndWorkItems
inputs.label: Download Commits and WorkItems
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enables downloading the commits and workitem details associated to the Jenkins Job

inputs.name: previousJenkinsBuildNumber
inputs.label: Download commits and workitems from
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mentions the previous Job Id. Commits and work items will be downloaded from all the builds between previous JobId and the current JobId

inputs.name: artifactDetailsFileNameSuffix
inputs.label: Commit and WorkItem FileName
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional file name suffix for commits and workitem attachment. Attachment will be created with commits_{suffix} and workitem_{suffix}. If this input is not provided attachments will be create with the name commits.json and workitems.json

messages.GetArtifactsFromLastSuccessfulBuild: Download artifacts from last successful build of %s
messages.GetArtifactsFromBuildNumber: Download artifacts from build number %d of %s
messages.CouldNotGetLastSuccessfuilBuildNumber: Could not get last successful build number
messages.ServerCallFailed: HTTP call to Jenkins server failed.
messages.JenkinsDownloadingChangeFromCurrentBuild: Cannot find previous JobId, will be fetching commits and workitems from current build %s
messages.DownloadingJenkinsChangeBetween: Downloading commits and workitems between job %s to %s
messages.GettingCommitsFromSingleBuild: Getting commits associated with the build %s
messages.DownloadingContentFromJenkinsServer: Downloading content form Jenkins server:%s with strict SSL:%s
messages.FetchCommitMessagesFailed: Fetching commits message failed with an error %s
messages.CouldNotWriteToFile: could not save the content to the file. Failed with an error %s
messages.DownloadingWorkItemsFromSingleBuild: Getting workitems associated with the build %s
messages.FindBuildIndex: Trying to find the build's index
